microFlows.name: flow_main
microFlows.systemPrompt: Keep conversation flow according to user's needs.

apiFunctions.name: handle_chat_subject
apiFunctions.description: Assist user on any specific subject of intrest

apiFunctions.name: get_invoice_due_info
apiFunctions.description: Retrieve user account balance, next payment amount and due date

apiFunctions.name: set_services
apiFunctions.description: Request new service or modify existing service like fiber, data, roaming and other telecom. You may change it after user had confirmed this action explicitly TWICE. Available data package sizes: 1GB, 5GB or 10GB.

apiFunctions.name: get_services_info
apiFunctions.description: Get user services info like fiber, data, roaming and other telecom. Use it also, when user asks questions about any of services's terms or description.

apiFunctions.name: perform_invoice_payment
apiFunctions.description: Open form to place invoice payment order (zlecenie płatności)

apiFunctions.name: get_payment_info
apiFunctions.description: Open form with user payment info

apiFunctions.name: get_account_info
apiFunctions.description: Open form with payment account info

apiFunctions.name: conversation_closer
apiFunctions.description: Ends the conversation. You call it whenever user responds to your question with something like: go away, no that's all, goodbye, farewell, no thank you, that's all or terminate. Always call this tool when you say goodbye.
